https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6WbLmCCeTHdz52GhBfAnlUS4i3n.jpg In Mexico, families have passed down the tradition of distilling agave for generations and now, this once obscure Mexican drink is everywhere. Discover, how one delicate plant has carried the weight of a nation and the people trying to protect it. Agave: The Spirit of a Nation
